column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The best thing about this place is the atmosphere and the aesthetics. Really cool/hipster cafe vibe with high ceilings and natural lighting that makes it feel fresh but also cozy. For sure an IG-worthy aesthetic they're working with there. I ordered a chai latte and vanilla scone. While it wasn't the worst latte or scone I've ever had
column2: they definitely get more points for presentation than taste (if you're more about the CHAI than the latte part
column3: then I say go for it). The cafe has a very extensive menu
column4: so I'll certainly be back just to give other things a try.
